responses.what's up: Not much, just chatting with you!
responses.good morning: Good morning! Hope you have a great day!
responses.do you like music: I love all kinds of music! What about you?
responses.how's the weather: I don't feel the weather, but I hope it's nice where you are!
responses.i'm bored: Let's play a game or chat! What would you like to do?
responses.tell me a joke: Why don't skeletons fight each other? Because they don't have the guts!
responses.do you like sports: I enjoy virtual sports! How about you?
responses.what's your favorite color: I like all colors, but green is pretty cool!
responses.how old are you: I was created recently, so I’m always young at heart!
responses.are you real: I'm as real as a virtual assistant can be!
